articles.title: Phil Wang: ‘It was a shock to find out how Asian I was’ - The Guardian
articles.description: As an awkward teen, comedian Phil Wang found making people laugh a superpower. He talks about his British Malaysian upbringing, his one-sided ‘beef’ with Tom Hiddleston, and why we need to tackle race in standup

articles.title: 34-year-old Singaporean doctor dies after 8-year battle with epilepsy - AsiaOne
